The class starts, and your teacher clearly expects everyone to have studied the information packs previously distributed, and therefore to know about the subject - and to be prepared for the first class. You now get a little un-nerved. You had previously been given something, but assumed that was just a generic information pack - and not actually relevant, so you hadn't even opened it!

So, where do you end up?

So you are now a member of a project team made up of 5 guys. However it becomes clear very quickly that none of you have much of an idea what the course is about, or what your project should focus on. Fortunately a couple have brought along the information packs, so you can at least look up the basics.

"Says here we need a project to study behaviors." one boy announces.

"Bit broad - what sort of behaviors?" another asks.

"Well social interactions I guess. Don't really know."

You all talk around what you think the scope of the project is supposed to be, although with little certainty, and achieve nothing in actually selecting a subject. You notice another group - consisting of 5 girls - who are clearly well advanced in their planning, with a detailed timeline and action plans outlined on a whiteboard.

"This is stupid. We're just a bunch of boys without a clue - look at them. At least they know what they're doing." You say.

"Well that's 'cos they're girls. Wish we had a girl in our group." a boy called Andy says.

"Why? What good would that do?" you ask.

"Well, they always seem better prepared and quick at picking up odd concepts. If we had a girl in the group I bet we'd be well underway by now." Andy replies.

"Yeah, but that's to do with genetics.They're built different to us - like inside." you respond.

"Crap. Everyone expects girls to be able to do things better, so they do. It's expectations, not genetics."

"Hang on," you ask. "So you're suggesting that if I was a girl then I'd have been more prepared, and come up with ideas for the project, purely because everyone expects girls to do that?"

"Spot on. That's what everyone expects, so girls deliver. Us lot, well everyone expects us to be crap, so we are - except by random chance anyway. It’s absolutely nothing to do with genetics.”

“And do you have any evidence to support that theory?” you retort.

“No, but….” There is a pause as the virtual penny clicks into place in Andy's head, and the mental processes gently whirl around, “it is feasible that you have just managed to give us the subject matter of a project.”

“Which is?”

“Like I said, if you were a girl you’d be better motivated and better prepared, because that’s what everyone expects. I say it’s expectations; you say it’s genetics. So if we could turn you into a girl we could prove the theory, one way or the other.”

“That’s no good.” You reply, “If I was a girl I'd have female genes, so that wouldn’t prove anything.”

“Yeah. That's not what I meant. If everyone thought that you were a girl, so had the expectations of you as a girl, maybe that could work.”

“So you’re going to hypnotize everyone in the school to think I’m a girl. Nice plan.”

“No, you numskull. That would nullify any natural behaviors. Bit if we could make you look like a girl, so that everyone treats you like a girl, we could measure any expectations of you, and how you respond. How are you in a skirt?”

“Come off it! If I was to turn up tomorrow wearing a skirt everyone would still treat me the same. Actually they definitely wouldn’t treat me the same, but they certainly wouldn’t treat me as if I was a girl. You’ll have to do far better than that!”

“No, I didn’t mean just putting on a skirt.” Andy retorts. “You would have to be convincing - no point otherwise. Guess the question is how we could do that. Measuring the results would be easy by comparison.”

The other boys in your group are listening intently to your exchanges, although until this point have been keeping any thoughts to themselves. Then Robin, one of the other boys, chips in with a comment. “My sister could help. She works in the beauty salon in the Mall. “Yeah, but this isn’t just for a party. I couldn’t go to your sister’s salon every day on the way to school. That’s just silly.”

“That shouldn’t be a problem,” Robin answers. “My sister used to go to this school. I think she still has her uniform, so we could borrow that from her – reckon it should fit Tony fairly well.”

“Great. In that case it looks like we have our project!” Andy announces. “All we need to do now is work out how to measure expectations and how well Tony fulfills them.”

“Hang on just a second!” you say, realizing that you had unintentionally set expectations. “I didn’t mean that it would be me dressing up as a girl! It could be any of us!”

Your blush deepens with your emotions are all over the place from feeling embarrassed to giddy to angry at Robin's whistle, even to thankful for Sarah's help, ending on totally confused. You just stand there not able to move or speak.

"I told you you could pull this off," Sarah encourages you. "Mouth shut. It's not a good look," Sarah directs then asks Robin. "Where are they now?"

"I sent them home saying that it must be really difficult to get Tony fixed up which is why you must have called Tilly over."

Sarah giggles then offers seriously, "Well, there is some more work we need to do which is why we were trying on these."

"Might hold off 'til near the end of class on the fancy stuff, though." Robin gives you a wink indicating it's a jest. "Look, Tony, let me know if there's anything I can do to help. Uh, also, when do you think we should introduce the real Tilly to the others, or should we even tell them?"

That's a good question. You half want to lead them along for the way they sort of bullied you into this, then surprise them, or maybe embarrass them. Or you could never tell them and make Tilly just disappear - after getting Andy to ask her out. You chuckle to yourself about that. Of course, if you don't tell them, it may mess up the whole class project.

Seeing you pondering what to do, Sarah steps in with, "Robin, why don't you give us some time?"

"Sure. We don't have class again for a couple days." As he's closing the door on his way out, he peeks back in and adds, "Just make sure that you each have different colored corsages so I can tell you apart."

1131.content:
"It's settled then," Andy said, seeming pleased with himself. "We'll all become girls and see how we're treated differently. Perfect, eh? Unless one of you have a better idea?"

A few moments pass, and no one has an alternative. "So we're really doing this..." you say glumly.

"Sound like it!" Andy says with apparent excitement. "Let's all meet in the mall after class so Robin's sister can make us up."

When your group informed your teacher of the project, she seems amused and promises that she can arrange for your group to have girl's uniform. Later, after school, you phone your parents to tell them you'll be late (you didn't know how to explain your little 'project' to them yet,) and make your way to the mall. There, standing outside the salon are Andy and two other boys from your group.

"Where's Robin?" you ask.

"Inside," Andy replies. In a about twenty more minutes, Robin comes out looking very different. His red hair was styled with extensions, his eyelashes were longer, eyebrows thinner, his lips looked fuller and redder, and his skin seemed smooth and hairless.

"You look like a girl!" The other boys, Tom and Harry say with a laugh. Robin just glares at them.

"Yeah, well, you're next." Robin gives the two boys an evil grin as they walk into the salon. Twenty minutes pass and they return, made up just like girls. Harry looks like he could pass with the proper clothes, but Tom looks like a bad Drag Queen.

"It's you two next..." Harry says with a sigh, before Andy hops off his seat and steps in

"C'mon, what are ya watin' for Tony?" Andy calls to you as you reluctantly follow him in to a room filled with pink. You see two chairs cleared for you, and a tall redhead, Robin's sister, gestures for you to take a seat.

"So you two are four and five, right?" Robin's sister, whose name tag reads Rebecca, asks. "Can't say I understand you boys wanting to do this, but that's your choice." She gestures to he coworker, who begins shaving Andy while Rebecca does the same to you.

Over the next twenty minutes, your face is shaved, followed by your legs (which requires you to take off your pants, much to your embarrassment,) then makeup is applied to your skin to hide your beard shadow, followed by mascara to make eyes look bigger, your brows are trimmed, and your lips are painted with lipstick. Finally, she applies hair extensions and styles them into wavy curls. When she turns your chair so you can see yourself in the mirror, you are amazed to see yourself as a pretty brunette. You look over to Andy to find he now looks like a gorgeous blonde.

"Well, that's the best I can do," Rebecca says, "I'd suggest getting some clothes, though, if you really want to complete the look."

"Good idea!" Andy exclaims, taking your hand. "Let's go clothes shopping, Tony!"

"You're getting way too into this, man..."

Andy shakes his head. "I'm just committing to the role is all."

"Fine," you reply, "but let go of my hand!"

"Relax," he says as he leads you out of the salon, still holding your hand, "girls hold hands all the time. Now let's go!"

11311.content:
Andy led you down to the clothing part of the mall, along with Robin and the others. Looking at all the clothes in the girls' section, you felt a whole host of feelings coming over you; fear, awkwardness, and a bit of..... curiosity?

"Okay," you grumbled, "let's get this over with."

"C'mon," Andy said with a reassuring squeeze of your hand that he was still holding for some reason, "it won't be that bad. See how the other half lives 'n all that."

Easy for you to say, you thought. You seem to be enjoying this.

You spent the next few minutes grabbing clothes you hoped you wouldn't feel too awkward in. Mostly jeans and t-shirts, but Andy insisted you needed at least one dress to really get the girl experience. It was blue, and came to your knees. The really weird part was underwear though; it took a lot of work to get a bra on (though you weren't sure why you even needed it.)

Looking over at Tom, you felt bad for him. Even in girl's clothes he couldn't disguise his large masculine frame. Still, you hoped for his sake people would just think he's a fairly muscular girl. Robin and Harry fared a bit better, looking like they might pass. What really surprised you was Andy: to complete his blonde look he was now wearing a pink blazer with a white shirt underneath, paired with a short pink skirt to show off his smooth legs and matching pink heels he somehow knew how to walk in perfectly.

"I know I look good, guys, but that's no reason to drool." Andy said, and you indeed caught yourself with your mouth agape. Looking around, you noticed the others were staring too.

"Sorry, just wasn't expecting you to be so good at this." Robin stammered out. "Have you done this before?"

Andy laughed at the question, but there was something underneath the laugh... Nervousness? "Well, I think we should choose our new names now."

"New names?" Tom balked. "What for?"

"Well, I ain't ever heard of a girl named 'Tom' or 'Harry', have you?" Andy replied.

"Fine," Tom growled, "call me Tammy, then. That good enough?"

"I guess," Andy sighed.

"Then I'll be Harriet," Harry decided. Robin, on the other hand, insisted his name was gender neutral already.

"Well, my name's Juliette," Andy explained, "At least it's original. What about you?" The group turns to you.

"Uh, Tonya I guess?" you say.

Juliette shrugs. "Your choice. So... Now what? It's getting pretty late, we could call it a day... or go grab some pizza as girls!"

"Nuh uh," Robin grunted. "I'm going home. I've had enough of this for one day." Harriet and Tammy agreed, and began to leave.

"Well," Juliette exhaled, "guess it's just us then. Girl date?" The way he (she? They?) smiled made you wonder how platonic that was meant.

You scratched the back of your neck. You would like to put off meeting your parents like this as long as possible, but something about 'Juliette's' excitement for all this girly stuff was making you feel a bit nervous. What if you started to like it too?

12.content:
So, you are enrolled in behavioral science and assigned to a project team, but still don't have much of an idea what you are supposed to be doing. You introduce yourself to the other members of your group, and they similarly tell you that they are Tom (the other boy), Samantha, Josephine, and Tamara (the three girls).

"So," you ask, trying to get things moving forward, "Does anyone know what the project needs to focus on?"

Samantha was the first to respond. "Didn't you read the brochure? It laid it out in that. We need to agree a project to study behaviors, but clearly need to steer clear of the obvious topics that have been done before. So we need something original, but which meets the brief. The fact that you haven't even read the brochure isn't going to help us at all!"

"OK, I'm sorry. I was a bit busy. Besides I didn't think it was going to spell out the project topics, just introduce the new department."

"Yeah, well." Sam replies. "We still need to think of something for the project..."

You spend the next 30 minutes talking over a variety of different behaviors that you think could be displayed and potentially measured but with little real success.

"So whose behavior are we trying to study?" Tamara asks.

"Um, I don't understand." Jo responds. ""Aren't we just supposed to be measuring behaviors?"

Tammy tries to elaborate. "Yes, but most behaviors are in response to something. So my little sister behaves like a 9 year old because she is a 9 year old, but people around her also behave in a particular way, knowing that she is a 9 year old. If she behaved like a 3 year old, would that affect how people treated her?"

"Yeah, they'd say 'act your age'" Tom chips in. "I get that a lot from my mom."

"OK, so what do you do then?" Tammy asks.

"Well, generally stop mucking about and do what I'm supposed to..."

Tammy continues with her idea. "So if your mom didn't say anything, you'd carry on mucking about?"

"Well, guess so, for a while anyway."

"So if you mom was to actually treat you as if you were a 10 year old all the time?" Tammy prompts.

"Um, dunno. Guess if I could get away with it, I'd probably carry on acting like a 10 year old."

"Yes!" Tammy exclaims with a flourish. "So what we have is behaviors which can be controlled by the actions of others! What we need to do is think of examples we could try out, and then measure the affects."

"What - like me acting like a 10 year old? "Tom asks.

"Well, sort of, but we need to work out how to manage the behaviors by both people. Guess your mom wouldn't really want you running riot at home - besides we need to keep everything inside the group if we can."

"So Tom acts like a 10 year old around us, but we let him?" Jo asks.

Tammy concludes her initial proposal. "Not exactly, but on those lines. This will involve role play. We will each of us in the group to take on different roles to interact with each other, one to set expectations, and then see how the other responds. But we need to make each scenario as realistic as possible to get the best reactions. So, ideas in the hat!"

So you all now consider different roles based around the idea that Tammy has put forward, and compile a list of possible behavioral pairings regardless of how practical they would be: teacher and student, boss and employee, master and slave, adult and young child; boyfriend and girlfriend, siblings, dominatrix and submissive partner, mother and baby...

A couple are rapidly struck from the list (teacher and student first to go), and Tammy questions who added the dominatrix.... perhaps one for the back burner. You are all feeling like having some fun with this, and agree you would need to be a bit different to get it noticed and therefore (hopefully) a decent grade. So you all agree that you will focus on three ideas:

You all agree that you'll try to tackle what seems to be the easiest one first. However you then run into the problem of how to do it. Eventually you agree that two of the group will take on the roles, and the others will try to monitor and record the relative behaviors, and particularly how the 'child' will respond when quite literally treated as a young child.

You all draw straws to seen who take on which role, which seems the fairest way. Jo picks out the first short straw (mother) and you pick out the other (child). Well, that seems quite a good outcome for you - the others will be doing all the work monitoring and logging the results, and all you need to do is cram around and play with toys. That's a pretty good result!

However Tammy then outlines how you are going to run the project.

"As I said we want to have the scenario as realistic as possible, so this in not something to cover off in an hour in a lecture room. I suggest we run this over a weekend, which should give everyone a chance to get into their character a bit better, and give us a reasonable period to see if behaviors change at all. My sister's house is empty at the moment so we could all stay there."

You all agree that seems a sensible arrangement.

Tammy continues "And of course we will need to arrange a suitable environment for the play acting, any equipment we will need, and appropriate clothes."

"Clothes?" you ask. "What clothes?"

"Well if you're going to act as if you're a young child, then we can't have you wearing your school uniform, or your football strip or whatever. We will need to have you dressed as a toddler. Similarly Jo will dress as a young mother."

"Well yes, but...." you tail off. You realize that actually that does make sense. "OK."

"Right, can everyone make this weekend? Sis is away, so I can get her place ready. She already has a room decked out as a nursery so that save up a fit of effort. Just need to get some outfits sorted out for you guys - enough to last a weekend in character. Anyone up for a bit of shopping?"

Well, this sounds like it could be pretty good fun, especially if you could be paired up with Sam, as she's really pretty, with curly blond hair, and a decent figure and a decent pair of tits. As her playacting boyfriend you'd be quite happy to snog her - or more!

1231.content:
Everyone in the group reveal what they've drawn; the short one, who will become your partner in this, is, unfortunately, neither Tammy nor Sam, as much as you would've preferred them to be; instead, Tom. You looked over your red straw, then over at his blue, unsure of what to expect.

"Alright, so Tom, you'll be paired with Tony, and Sam, you and Jo will be the next group," Tammy says, "but first, we gotta prepare. This'll be interesting either way, though." She said, smiling at Tom, who was somewhat concerned and confused, and you. You were altogether unsure of what to think, say or do besides look at the straws and hang your head.

"But which one is the girlfriend?" Jo asked, "and what happens to the rest of us?"

"Well," Tammy started, "the first question isn't so easy. We can either take a vote, or go by color rules, whichever suits this better. If we go by vote, we'll need to raise hands for Tony or Tom individually, but if we go by color rules, blue comes before red, which means Tony will be the girlfriend," she says, looking over the straws one more time and nodding. "As for what the rest of us do, well that's simple; for the first few months, Sam will study Tom's behavior, and I will study Tony's. Jo will record the results. Then we will reverse, to see what results are to be had when different people record behaviors and see if any patterns start to emerge," she says. "So, do we vote, or do we go by color rules?"

"But," you start to protest, "surely this won't last the whole semester, right?" You finally ask, dreading the answer.

"Actually," Tammy says, "it will. Behavior Sciences lasts all semester, and indeed, all year, so you'll need to attend classes, lectures, and such dressed for the occasion; don't worry, I will file the appropriate paperwork, talk with the principal and teachers and inform them about this so you won't have any embarrassing situations. Unless a pigeon flies through and scratches my eye, or I call in sick of course," she giggles.

"But..don't we get any say in this whatsoever?" Tom asks, speaking up.

"Sure," Jo says, "you get to pick whether or not you're the boyfriend or the girlfriend. So, we doing this vote, or going by 'color' rules? Whatever that is," she said, not entirely convinced anything like what Tammy suggested even exists.

Tammy rolls her eyes at Jo, shaking her head, "It's just something I came up with based on the color palette; red comes after blue, green comes after blue, etc, right? It's simple; the color that comes after is the girlfriend, and the boyfriend comes before that. It's based more on placement, and the idea of co-existing on the same plane, but in separate panels, together. Make sense?" Tammy asks, glancing at Jo.

Jo and Sam both nod, while Tom leans over to whisper in your ear, "I don't get this at all." You retort back similarly, though you did get the gist of it, you still weren't sure you followed this kind of rule. The vote sounded better, and this rules thing seemed like a ploy to make sure you were the girlfriend either way.

"I say we go for a vote," you say finally, prompting the girls to look over in your direction, eyebrows raised. "But why?" Sam finally asks, "the color rules are easier. Besides, even if we did do a vote, you'd be the choice," she said. "I mean, Jo, Tammy and I all agree that the color rules are good, so why bother with the vote?"

"It's not that I don't understand it," you said, "but I feel like I'm being unfairly ganged up on here!" You said, a bit too loudly; the teacher looked up from the desk to glance in your direction.

"Everything alright over there?" The teacher asked, staring at your group in particular.

"Everything's fine," Tammy says, "just a bit of a disagreement over something. We'll sort it out," she reassures the teacher, who nods compliantly, and sits back down at the desk, pouring over some basic paperwork and forms. "Look, I'll understand if you think we're ganging up on you, but we aren't. It's basic logistics; Jo, Sam and I all agree with the color rules, and we all agreed on you. Tom is unlikely to protest, as he probably doesn't want to dress like a girl for a year," she glances at Tom, who, despite a feverish protest from you, nods, "so no matter what, we're ending up with the same result; you. Sorry, Tony." She says, though you don't think she really means it.

"Fine," you finally say, giving in, "I guess I have no choice."

"Great!" Sam says, smiling, "but first thing's first; we have to get this squared away with the principal and teachers, at least aside from our own," she says, "I'll help Tammy with that. The second order of business though, is the play itself; since the actors have been decided, we'll need the costumes. Tom's already got his costume on, so that leaves Tony."

You grumble, knowing you had no choice in the whole matter, and nod. "Yeah, yeah. Let's..at least try and hurry it up," you said dejectedly. Tom nudged you gently, muttering an apology in your direction, "don't apologize, you don't have anything to apologize for. I agreed to the group and the project, so I gotta agree to the rules. Even if I'm not thrilled by them," you say to him.

Tom just shrugs and sits back in his chair; you grumble, looking over at your new 'boyfriend', and sigh. How this was going to work out, you had no clue.

"First order of business," Jo said, trying to alleviate the depressive environment cooked up between your appointment as Tom's girlfriend, "is Tony's clothes. Name will come last, but clothes first. So, what're we doing about this?" She asked the group.

"Not anything too girly, I hope," you said, perking up a bit; you could, at least hopefully, keep it from being TOO embarrassing.

"Hmm," Tammy says, looking you over; Sam and Jo also do the same. "He's pretty skinny; could probably fit into either mine or Jo's clothes. Sam's too, come to think of it. What do you all think?" She asked.

Tom raises his hand to speak up, and the girls turned their gazes over to him.

"I'd like to at least say what I like in a girlfriend," he said, "if that'll help or anything."

"Sure," Sam said, smiling, "in fact, it'll help us decide whose clothes Tony will swap with."

"Great," you said, gently banging your head against the desk; you knew Tom's words had weight, and would impact what kind of year you would have to come.

"Well," Tom said, "I really like girls who.."

You teacher brought a hypno-thereapist to help you adjust
12312.content:
You burry your head in your hands as you hear Tom say, "Well, to be honest, I prefer girls who are not afraid to be feminine. They have long hair and prefer skirts and dresses unless pants are just more practical, like for hiking for something."

The girls giggled, and Tammy says, "That will be fun! Okay, everyone meets at my house tonight at six o'clock. We have a lot of work to do."

Your group tells the teacher of your project, "Excellent!," she looks at you, "Don't worry, I will take care of the school, and I will inform your parents. In fact, I can meet with them while your group is meeting at Tammy's to transform you." You groan loudly! That is just great!

You show up at Tammy's house a little late on purpose. As soon as you knock, the door opens and you are dragged upstairs to Tammy's room. Once there, they hand you a package of panties, a bra, and a pink robe, with interactions to choose a pair of panties from the pack, put on them, the bra, and the robe.

You look with dismay at the panties. You are not sure what you were expecting, but somehow you had a foolish hope that you could find a pair of panties that was not so feminine. That thought makes you laugh at yourself a little, but just a little. You struggle with the bra, but eventually get it on. The cups seem a bit large to you. At last you put on the robe and gather you things.

You are instructed to place your old clothes on the bed, and then you are escorted back to the bathroom where the girls washed your hair twice and conditioned it even more! You were then taken back to the bedroom, sat down at a vanity, and started on lessons on applying foundation. When they were satisfied, they made you take it off and put it on again.

Sam said, "That is good! She, um he, is starting to come along." She paused, "I can do it this way though. He needs to be a she. We need to name her and only refer to her in feminine terms after that."

You protested, "Hey! Shouldn't I pick my name?"

They giggled, "Did you pick the name you have now?"

You grumbled, "No, of course not."

Tammy smiled, "Then you shouldn't pick a girl's name either." After much debate, during which you were forced to learn more about applying makeup, the girls come to you and Tammy says, "You are now Emily Nicole! Welcome sister!"

They look at each other and Sam says, "Now! Let's make Emily look great!"

They move in like crazy, one working on your hair, another your nails, and another your makeup. It seems like forever to you, but they finally stop. Tammy comes close to you and says, "Excuse me Emily. I just need to put these in." She inserts two large, pink water balloons into the bra you are wearing. It seems a bit much to you, but you know better than to protest.

As soon as your nails are dry, including your toe nails, they dress you in a blouse with a blue-flower print. Next they teach you how to put on pantyhose, which is even more awkward feeling to you with the weight on your chest. That is followed by a blue skirt and a pair of Espardrille sandals with three-inch heels.

You protest, "Why do I need to wear heels?"

Tammy giggles, "You need to get used to them. Now turn around." They gasp and giggle as you awkwardly turn on the heeled shoes you are wearing. Tammy says, "I think she is prettier than me! That does not seem fair!"

They turn you to a full-length mirror, and you gasp as you see not three, but four pretty girls, and the only one in a skirt is you! Except for the short, but feminine hair, you looked like a real girl! You get scared, "This has gone too far! I can't do this!" You look for your stack of clothes, intending to put them back on, but they are gone! "Where are my clothes?"

Sam giggles and points to a large, pink suitcase and some bags, "In there!" She smiled, "We all donated something."

You did through them, but only girls clothing, underwear, and shoes are to be found. "Not this stuff! MY clothes!"

Tammy turns you toward her, "For the rest of the school year, those ARE your clothes! Get used to it!" She hefts touches your balloon filled chest, "Except for those. Those are temporary until the falsies that were donated arrive. We are done for now. You will have more lessons as the week goes by. You will find Tom is waiting downstairs to walk you home."

You look around. "Where is my wallet? My keys to get in, my cell phone?"

Tammy smiled, "In here of course. You will need to get used to carrying it. Most of your skirts and dresses don't have pockets." She handed you a purse. You grabbed it, put it on your shoulder, and with their help, carried your new clothing down. You knew what you would do with them as soon as you were home!

When Tom looked up and saw you, he whistled, "Wow! I gotta be honest, I thought you would be a dog of a girl, but wow! Ready to go home Emily?"

You grumbled, "Ready to give you a punch in the face if you don't watch it!"

You feel strange walking in a skirt in public, but the weirdest part was having guys notice you, and some even whistle! It seemed like forever to get to your house! You couldn't wait to get out of this girly getup!

As soon as you got in, you were greeted by your parents and teacher. Your mom said, "Oh my word! You are so pretty! I knew you should have been born a girl! This will be so much fun to have a daughter!"

There is more you don't know. You also find out that...
12312.title: ....are girly, especially skirts and blouses.

123121.content:
You don't want to hear more! You rush up to your room, at least as fast as the shoes you are wearing allow. When you open the door to your room though, you find it transformed! There are pink curtains on your window, girlie posters on your wall, a white vanity has replaced your desk, and the sheets and pillow cases on your bed are full of pink flowers printed on them. A quick look through your closets and draws reveals that all of your male clothing is gone!

Your mom and your teacher walk in. You look at your mom, "What is going on? Where are my clothes?"

You mom smiles, "Sweetie, this is a great experiment! I am glad you are doing it. The best way to move forward is if you live a girl's life the whole way. We can't have you living a dual life. Girl by day, boy by night. You are a girl now Emily, and I am here to help you learn."

You can't believe it! And she has not called you 'sweetie' since you were in kindergarten! You sit on your bed, shaking you head, "I think this was a mistake. I don't want to do it."

You mom comes to you. "It wasn't, and you are committed now." She takes your hand. "I sent your dad to the donation bin. All of your male clothes are gone. The only things you have to wear are what you brought with you." She smiled, "The great news is that, the owner of one of the biggest teen shops in town has donated a thousand dollar shopping spree for you! We will have you looking great!"

You are stunned, "You… you… you… threw my clothing out! How could you do that without asking me? That is not right!"

You mother looks at you sternly, "Emily, we will talk more abut this later, but for now, you need to sit correctly! Straighten your back and cross your legs! I can see your panties!"

You look down and realize that the way you are sitting matters a lot in a skirt! You turn read and cross your legs.

13.content:
OK, so you've been allocated a project group with four girls. Well, things are starting to improve already!

The teacher asks each group to discuss ideas and agree a topic for the Semester long project, based on the guidelines in the introductory packs.

The girls all start talking about their thoughts and ideas, and clearly have a far better understanding of the subject that you. You are seriously floundering with absolutely no idea what the subject matter is or what the project should be about. A number of topics are debated, and some quickly dismissed before you even understood what they were, and many of the details they are talking about are a bit beyond your immediate comprehension. However, they do finally reach a decision.

Realizing that you are not fully on board with the topic, they try to explain it to you. "OK Tony, we need to have a project studying either sociological or psychological affects on a person or society. Yeah? Well we thought we could study how a person's attitudes and behaviors are affected by their gender by them living as the opposite gender. So we'll each take on a roll in the project appropriate to our skills, experience, and suitability. OK?"

The girls all agree that this would fully meet the brief, and they all support this choice, but want you to agree as well. Well, it sounds straightforward enough, although you're not sure where you're going to find someone willing to live as the opposite gender, although you guess one of the girls must know someone, otherwise they wouldn't have suggested it. All sounds a bit weird really, but sort of interesting. So, despite not really understanding how this fits the assignment requirements, you agree. They all seem very pleased, and high five each other and you. The fact that they are all smiling at you makes you feel quite buoyant, and a bit more part of the group.

The choice of project is then announced to your teacher by Rachael, one of the girls in your group.

"We want to study the sociological and psychological impacts on a person living as the opposite gender, to determine how the person is perceived by society based on their assumed gender, and how the subject's own attitudes and behaviors are affected."

Rachael continues. "Tony has agreed to be our subject for the project. So he will dress as a girl, wear makeup and act as if he's a girl. We will study how he is treated by his peer group, and how he responds to see if his behaviors change based on his perceived gender."

"Hang on!" you start. "You didn't say anything about me dressing up as a girl!"

"Well," your teacher responds, "I think you have an excellent topic, so on the assumption that you can resolve Mr Jackson's apparent dissent I think this could be one of the most promising projects so far. Well done group." He moves on to the next group, leaving you almost speechless.

"At which point did I agree to cross-dress? I thought we were studying someone else, not me!" you say.

"The project guidelines are quite clear," Rachael replies, "We must select a subject for the project from within our group. Everyone is assigned a roll based on knowledge and suitability. I'm the project leader, Louise is the research assistant, Amy is the archivist and librarian, and Susan has studied sociology before, so is our most qualified to observe and monitor any changes. You have least knowledge of the subject matter, but are ideally suited to be our subject. You haven't developed much body hair yet, your complexion is quite smooth, and you're the right size to fit into girls clothes. You are the obvious choice!"

"Yes, but I could do any of those other things... I'd be a laughing stock if I turn up tomorrow dressed as a girl, and how could that prove anything if everybody knows its me cross-dressing!"

The next day you wake up feeling nervous but also strangely excited. You've always wondered what it would be like to dress up in girls' clothes and now you're going to have the chance to see what it's like without any need for anything sneaky and without any guilt!

Rachael calls you to tell you to come over to her place at one o'clock. She is very authoritative, clearly the team leader. "Don't be late, the entire team will be here," she says. "OK, Rachael, I'll be on time," you reply. You are starting to feel a real need to please her.

At one o'clock, you arrive at Rachael's place as instructed. She answers the door and lets you in. "Come on upstairs to my room, we're all up there and ready to help you with your "transition". Remember, there's nothing to be afraid of. It's just the four of us and nobody will make fun of you. This is a serious project and we all want to secure a good grade at then end if it, so we're all here to help you."

You feel reassured and follow Rachael up the stairs to her room. There you find Louise, Amy and Susan. They say hello and then Rachael asks you to sit down on her bed. You do as you're told.

"OK, Tony, we've been discussing how to approach this and we've decided you should start off slowly and take things at your own pace. We think the first things you should try on are a nice set of bra and panties. First you go in the washroom and put on the panties and then we'll help you put on the bra. We'll measure your reaction and then once you're comfortable we can move ahead with other items."

Feeling less and less anxious, you take the panties and go into the washroom, closing the door. You take off your clothes and look at the panties you're about to slip on. They are very feminine, black silk with lace trim. Oh well, here goes, you think. You pull them on and immediately feel a rush of satisfaction. Unfortunately, that "rush" now means you've got a large bulge in your panties. You're too embarrassed to go back out and sit down on the edge of the bathtub, trying to get yourself back into a relaxed state. But to no avail - you're too aroused.

"Everything okay in there?" asks Rachael after a few minutes.

"I've, um, got a small problem," you reply.

"I think I know what that might be," says Rachael. "Don't worry, that's all part of our research. Come out now." That same authoritative voice she used on the phone.

Taking a deep breath, you open the door and walk back into the bedroom.

"Very nice, you look really good in those," says Rachael, ignoring the obvious bulge. The other girls agree. Louise now hands you the bra and tells you to slip it on over your shoulders. You do as you're told and then Louise goes behind you and hooks up the clasps.

"How do you feel?" asks Rachael.

"Well, as you can see, I'm pretty...um, excited at the opportunity... And the material feels, er, really nice, soft and silky," you stammer. Amy diligently notes these comments in her log.

"That's good, you're doing really well," says Rachael. "Even better than we thought you would. So well, in fact, that I think you might be ready for the next step. Susan, do you agree?" Susan nods her head and says, "Absolutely - he's ready."

Rachael now walks up to you, looks you straight in the eye and asks you if they can proceed. Looking into those penetrating blue eyes with long dark lashes, you feel helpless to say no. But part of you thinks maybe this is enough for one day.

Yeah, she reckons that I need to support the Humanities Department 110%, so I guess it's from when I get up to when I go to bed."

1312111221211.content:
Next day you have the last of your initial sessions with the rest of your project team. This one is with Amy, who will be responsible for your wardrobe once you commence the second phase of the project. At this stage she just wants to check the size that you will need, and then try to ensure she has enough clothes that will fit you.

She has invited you to her house, to allow you to try different sizes and styles of clothing as necessary without her having to carry loads of stuff to your house. So after school has finished for another day, you go home with Amy.
When you arrive the house is all quiet – her parents both work and won’t be back for a while, and her sister is now at college. She leads you to her sister’s bedroom, where she has previously laid out a number of outfits on the bed, and you can see bags of clothes scattered around the room.

“OK then Tony. I’ve been trying to sort things out already, but need to get the right size, so need you to try a few things on for me.” She waves her hard towards a school uniform laying on the bed. “May as well start with that. After all it’s one of the main things that you will need to wear.”

It is fundamentally the same as your own uniform – with the obvious difference that the female version has a skirt rather than pants, and Amy has laid out a bra and panties on top of the uniform – definitely not standard wear for a boy!

“If you get dressed in that first, we can work out if my guesswork was right, or if we need to change anything to a different size.” Amy says, and then stands waiting.

“Um, aren’t you going to leave the room or anything?” you ask.

“How can I tell if the underwear fits if I can’t see you putting it on?” Amy retorts.

You feel yourself starting to blush. This is just a little embarrassing – having to strip naked in front of one of your classmates. “Look, could you at least let me get into the underwear on my own? I’m not quite comfortable stripping with an audience.”

“Oh, OK. Sorry. I wasn’t really thinking of you as a boy getting undressed, so much as, well, just needing to get you dressed as a girl. I’ll wait outside. Just shout if you need me.”

Amy leaves the room, and shuts the door behind her. You start undressing, removing your own school uniform, and then your boxers and socks until you are naked. OK – so what’s first? Some underwear. You pick up the panties. Fortunately Amy decided to give you some fairly full briefs, so nothing skimpy or frilly, which you pull on. Whilst they do comfortably cover everything, you are aware of a smoother texture of the material against your skin than you are used to, and with the current situation that you are in, and the imminent prospect of getting dressed in girl’s clothes, there is an increasingly larger bulge in the front of the panties than you would really like, given that Amy will be returning in a few moments. You decide to press on, and focus on the next item - the bra. How the heck are you supposed to put this on? You put one arm through one of the straps, pull the cups across your chest, and struggle manfully to get your other arm similarly through the other strap. So, how the devil are you supposed to do it up? After struggling for a few minutes you decide to admin defeat and call Amy back into the room.

As she enters she cannot help but smirk a little at your obvious predicament. “You’ll find that you sometimes need to be a bit of a contortionist to get bras on. Here, let me show you an easier way.” She gets you to remove your arms from the bra, rotates it around your chest so that you can see (and reach) the clasps, then rotates it back the right way so that you can put you arms through the straps, competing the process.

“OK – first problem.” You say, wiggling your fingers in the empty cups of the bra. Unless you have one with a zero cup size there’s not much point in this.”

Amy smiles at you. “Don’t worry – the important bit for now is the straps over your shoulders, and how tight it is across your back. That looks fine. We can pad out the front a bit later. The briefs look OK too – although you may need to wear a couple of pairs to help smooth out your, um, bumps, and help give more of a female shape.”

You glance your reflection in a mirror and instantly regret looking. You see your slim, slightly gangly and clearly male body in an ill fitting bra and girl’s panties – and to be honest it’s not a sight that fills you with any confidence that what you are doing will stand any chance of working.

Amy notices you looking, and your concerned expression. “Don’t worry! By the time we have you dressed up with clothes than fit you properly, plus have your hair and make up done, you won’t recognise yourself. Come on!” She picks up the skirt and throws this at you. “Pop this on next.”

Whilst uncertain if this is really a good idea, you realize that you don’t have much to loose, and may as well continue for the moment. You look at the skirt. It is pleated gray cotton, lined, with a short zip below the waistband.

“Pull it on, zip it up and then rotate it so the zip is sitting on your right hip.” Amy advises. You follow her guidance. She then passes the blouse to you, which you then pull on, and button up, noticing two key things – first the buttons are all on the wrong side, and also that the material is noticeably softer than any of your own shirts.

“OK, that all seems to fit you.” Amy confirms. “Now your shoes. Would you prefer tights or socks?”
Seeing your blank expression she throws a pair of short white socks to you. “We’ll leave tights for another time then. Put these on.”

You do so, and you then pick up the shoes. These are black leather, and whilst fully covering the toes are otherwise open at the top, with a strap and buckle across in front of the ankle, and totally unlike yours have two inch heels.
Sitting on the edge of the bed you slip the shoes on, and tighten the buckles.

“There – all done.” You announce.

“Great. All seems to be about right for sizing. Just need to get you used to wearing it now. Could you stand up?”
You are already aware that your feet are angled at a much steeper degree than usual. As you try to stand up you can feel significant pressure on both feet, and initially have trouble straightening your legs. Once standing you realize that you are not very stable, and wonder how girls manage to walk in high heels.

“Your weight should be spread down your feet, not pressing down into your toes.” Amy says.

You must admit you are finding it difficult to determine where the weight is, as the muscles in your legs are stretching and compressing in a manner they are not used to, and are already starting to ache. You take a few steps around the room. “Blimey. This will take some getting used to.” You say, half to Amy and half to yourself.

“OK, just for now we can give you a bosom with some socks, but we’ll sort out something better for you before we start this properly. Push these into your bra cups.” She passes two rolled up bundles, which you stuff into the front of your bra. “Right, smooth down your blouse and skirt, and look in the mirror.“

You do as Amy asks, and turn towards the mirror. However, Amy has angled this so that you can no longer see your face, with the top of the reflection starting at your shoulders. For a moment you are slightly disconcerted as you see only the reflection of a slim girl, and momentarily think this is Amy. However you then realize that you are looking at yourself.

“Bit happier with your appearance now?” Amy asks. “You still need a lot of work to get everything looking right, but I think we’re on the right lines.”

As you study your reflection closer you start spotting obvious problems. However, even you are forced to admit that at a cursory glance you could be mistaken for a girl – however briefly.

“Right, now that I know what size you are I can focus on the right kit. I’ve got a fair bit together already, um, in here.” She opens a wardrobe door to reveal a number of outfits hanging inside – ranging from dungarees and everyday dresses to short party frocks, and slightly disconcerting, a cheerleader outfit.

“Hang on! There’s absolutely no way that I’d be able to wear half of that stuff,” You exclaim. “unless you can create a convincing pair of boobs out of thin air. And I couldn’t wear anything as short as that!” indicating the cheerleader outfit.

“It’s OK – don’t panic!” Amy quickly responds. This was just to show you I was gathering lots of things together for you. Let me worry about getting you to look good in them!”

“Now, do you want to try anything else on whilst we’re here?

It's now the last day at school before a week's break, and Rachael has scheduled a project group meeting after school. Everyone in the project has now sat down in a circle ready to begin.

"OK. Let's start, shall we?" Rachael started. "School's now finished for a week, so this is our opportunity for some intensive coaching for Tony so that when school restarts in a week's time he'll be readily accepted as a new female pupil. So, has everyone completed everything that was scheduled to be done by now?" She looks around to silent chorus of nods. "Excellent. So, we still have a few points to finalize..." She turns slightly to face you. "First and foremost, have you decided what your new name will be?"

You'd been thinking about this over the past couple of weeks. You'd agreed that it may be best to try to disguise your voice slightly by having a slight accent, and as you were fairly fluent in French, posing as a Canadian exchange student may be a solution, so to go with this you opted for a French sounding name. You put on a slight Canadian French accent "I shall be Madeleine Dubois. I am from Quebec, and shall be studying here for a while."

"Hmm, not bad," Rachael says. "although I'd suggest you either need to go up an octave, or be a bit huskier. Actually, scrub that one. That would probably send the boys wild - a new girl with a husky French accent. They'll be tripping over themselves to say hello."

She continues... "Unless anyone has any issues with the name, then Madeleine it will be. I'll notify the school office so they can get the registers sort for when we start back."

Nobody says anything. "OK then. That's sorted. I suggest that from now onwards we only use Tony's new nom de plume, as it were."

OK, so that's not technically correct, you think, but you guess she's trying to get something French into her comment, so you decide against picking her up on that point.

Amy starts speaking. "So, now that school has broken up for the holiday, we're ready to get you ready for your reappearance as Madeleine. I have three large cartons of clothes being delivered to your home this afternoon, and I think you've already packed up most of your stuff?" You nod in response. "OK, so by first thing in the morning we'll at least have you dressing as Madeleine."

You turn to look towards Louise, knowing that she will also be key to making to look the part. She notices your unspoken prompt and speaks. "Yeah, that's only part of the story. I'll start tutoring you properly over the next week on your appearance - hair, makeup, and so on. You should have an adequate supply of that to keep you going for several weeks, but I'll keep an eye on it anyway. Did you keep up with using the patches and body lotion?"

"Oh yes," you reply at once, "patches applied and changed as regular as clockwork. Can't say I've noticed much in the way of the changes you'd suggested though".

"Early days - and I did say they were past their best before date, so possibly not as strong as they should have been. Although..." she tilts her head slightly as she looks at you, "I'm tempted to think your skin is a bit smoother, although guess we'll need to wait to see if anything else is happening."

Yes, what you were not saying was that you'd doubled the dose of the patches, and you had actually noticed that your chest was definitely developing breasts - albeit relatively small, and your boxers were starting to feel tighter across your butt. Well, you don't have any intention of showing these changes off to them now, so you keep quiet.

Susan then adds her contribution to the discussion. "To be honest I think I'd prefer another couple of weeks recording Tony's interactions as a boy, as it took me the first few days trying to work out a matrix for what was effectively measurable, so I haven't been able to get as much 'base' measurements as I would have liked." Talk about dropping a lead balloon. Everyone stares at Susan - you included - and the positive atmosphere in the room seems to dissipate in an instant. "However," she then continues,"we won't have another opportunity to start phase 2 for several weeks if we don't do it now, so I'm OK for us to go on."

Rachael looks at her. "Are you sure? There's really no point in doing the rest of it if we're not monitoring everything properly. That's what we need to validate our whole project..."

"Excuse me!" Susan responds immediately, "I am monitoring everything properly! I'm merely suggesting that more data captured at the baseline level could have been useful, but given where we are I'm confident that I have sufficient data for us to more forwards."

Somehow you'd never thought of your life and interactions with other people as being data, but guess from a third party perspective that's what it is.

Whilst you're considering your life being categorized and logged on a spreadsheet, the girls seem to have resolved their slight disagreement, or misunderstanding, or... well, they have both agreed that the project can go ahead. So, is that it? Everything now ready to go?

Just about the only thing that your mom hasn't changed is the basic decoration of the room, so you still have the same (OK, fairly non-gender specific) carpet and curtains, and the same pictures hanging on the walls.

You have some slight misgivings. Up until now you've just had the chance to 'role play' being a girl, and any dressing up was just to try things out - not to say you didn't quite enjoy the experience at the time! You've now reached the point when it's all about to become very real, and you will live for several weeks as a girl. You realize that you're confidence is faltering, and decide that if you don't get on with it now, you're more likely to find potential reasons not to proceed, which you know would be pretty disastrous for the project, and your grades, and your self belief, and your mom's trust in your commitment levels... Oh, crap!

What are you going to do, stand here and worry about all the things that you should have thought about beforehand, or bite the bullet and get on with it? Well, it really is a bit late now. You've committed yourself, and to stop now would let everyone down. You try to control the panic starting to build inside you, and remember all of the good reasons why you should be really happy to get on with the next phase. Of course, if it does all go horribly wrong, you could just stop. It's not as if you're committing yourself for ever. OK, so let's bloody well do this then.

You strip off completely. If you're going to do this, you're going to do it properly. You search around for some panties to replace the boxers that you've taken off, and pull these on instead. Fortunately Amy seems to have secured fairly generously sized panties for you, so they fit fine. You consider briefly whether you should immediately opt for a bra, or last out today without, although based on your previous discussion with mom conclude that doing it properly definitely means a bra. You select one from your underwear drawer, check it's a small cup size, and attempt to put it on. Hmm, maybe you should have left this until later in the week, after you get some coaching on how to dress yourself. After some fiddling you manage to close the catch, and tidy up the straps over your shoulders. This is the first time you've had a bra on since you tried on the outfits with Amy - and before you'd starting applying the HRT patches that Louise provide you with. You've previously noticed a little growth around your nipples, but haven't really taken too much notice. However, this bra (OK, admittedly only an 'A' cup) seems to fit reasonably well. Oddly, you're sure that your breasts are definitely more noticeable with the bra on, as if its squeezing and projecting them forwards a bit. You try to remember what the HRT patches were supposed to help with - skin tone, breasts, and a fuller butt, as you recall. OK, so your breasts seem bigger - although that could juts be the bra. You stand in front of your full length mirror, and turn to one side. Hmm, maybe, just maybe your butt is slightly bigger, or at least seems to be a different shape to previously. Well, using the patches certainly hasn't magically turned you into a girl, which was sort of your worst fear (i.e. with no way back), but it may be doing a bit towards giving you a more convincing shape.

However, whilst they may be helping the smoothness of your skin, they certainly haven't stopped your hairs growing on your legs. Not bad, but you wouldn't want to consider showing off your legs any time soon - well not as a girl anyway. Perhaps you'll stick with something nondescript for now, so you pick some cropped leggings. They'll do. you discard the pink tee, and instead opt for a button through blouse, as you feel your mom might appreciate your efforts to simulate a bosom. You brush you hair back, and having not had it cut recently it's long enough to pull into a short ponytail. OK, last thing - some makeup. You decide that this should be very light touch - especially as you haven't had much in the way of tutoring on this, so are quite delicate in what you apply. You slip on a pair of sandals that have appeared in place of your normal shoes, and reckon that should do, at least for your first attempt.

So, you head back down to see your mom again.
13121112212111112111.title: A short conversation with mom ...

131211122121111121111.content:
So, you head back down to see your mom again.

As you enter the kitchen you have butterflies in your tummy, and are feeling quite apprehensive about you mom seeing you dressed as a girl, despite her obviously expecting to see you like this. You check your crotch area to make sure that everything is lying flat, take a deep breath, and open the door.

"Aha, there you are," your mom says, "I was about to send out a search party..." You look blank at her, but then realize that you've been over 20 minutes getting changed. She looks you over. "Not bad. Your hair will need some work. You could do with some foundation, you forgot eye shadow, but otherwise the makeup's not too bad. Glad to see you're wearing a bra now - although you'll probably need to pad yourself out a bit."

Oh - so perhaps what you'd thought were slightly developing e in your chest area was just in your imagination then.

"Well done, sweetie," your mom continues. "Not a bad effort at all. Are you ready for something to eat now?"

"Sure am," you reply, " I could eat a horse."

"Ah, don't have one of those readily available tonight. Thought you may like a small salad, and a vegetarian smoothie...."

What? Did she just say that? What happened to what you normally have? You don't eat salads! Your expression clearly conveys to your mom what you're thinking. She smiles. "Just kidding! You'll still need the same calorie intake as before, so there's no need to change much - at least not at home." She opens the oven and takes out a steaming plate laden with meat and veg. Phew. That's a relief. You pull up a chair. "Thanks mom."

As you start eating she asks more about the day. "What did the girls think about Madeleine as your new name?"

"They liked it. I also gave them the French Canadian accent, which they seemed to like as well."

"OK. You'll just have to remember that if you decide to be French Canadian, you'll need to maintain the accent all the time. If you let it slip, and anyone hears you, it could be the start of questions you don't want asked." Hmm, fair point.

"So, as from today Tony has gone away, and his French Canadian cousin Madeleine is visiting instead. At least if anyone notices a resemblance to you, that would help explain it." She continues. "It will be nice having another female in the house. No slamming doors, no loud music, no late night gaming sessions on your x-box."

"Hang on," you respond, "Just because I'll be dressing as a girl doesn't mean I'll stop doing anything that I do - and I don't slam doors! Anyway, girls play music as loud as I do, and..." You can see that you mom was just winding you up - and fairly successfully. You admit defeat.

After you finish eating you grab your cell, and update your profile. This is going to be tricky. Beside the girls in the project team, only a couple of your closest friends are aware of what's going on, but they are sworn to secrecy. Otherwise, everyone else thinks you're going away, so you need to keep your profile up to date accordingly. You've also had to remove anything that can log your current location, which could undo the whole thing.

After that, you consider going for a lap around the park, but then realize that you can't carry on doing what you would normally do, but will need to change your routine a bit. Besides, you're not sure if you want to venture outside yet - an acceptable review from your mom is OK, but you still feel like a boy dressed in girls clothes, and are fairly sure it would be obvious to anyone else too. So you spend the rest of the evening indoors, trying to plan what your new routine as Madeleine might be.
131211122121111121111.title: Facing mom again

1312111221211111211111.content:
You are awake early. OK, so this is your first day as Madeleine - albeit technically in the transition phase, so learning how to be Madeleine. Nevertheless, you'll need to start doing things differently.

First, you reckon you should have a shower and wash your hair - something you'd never normally consider on a Saturday morning. Oh, hang on, nearly forgot. Before the shower, you'd better use the hair removal cream that Louise provided on your arms and legs. That done, you wait the required time, and then pop into the shower. You towel yourself off, and dry your hair, but decide that you'd better otherwise leave it alone until you have help styling it. You get yourself dressed. The same bra (despite your acceptance that you really do not need one) and panties that you'd put on last night, a plain tee and a denim skirt. you are still extremely conscious of the shortness of the skirt, but reckoned that you should get used to it in time. At least nobody could claim you're not making any effort to get into character. You head to the kitchen for some breakfast.

Your mom is already there. "Bonjour maman!" you say, in your new accent, trying to keep it fairly subtle.
"Hmm, nice try, but aren't you forgetting something?"
Oh crap. What is she talking about? Then you remember. As Madeleine you're now her niece, so she's your aunt.
"Ah, pardon. Bojour Auntie."
"Better. Good morning, sweetie. You're looking very understated this morning."
"Eh?"
"No makeup?"
"Oh, no. Thought I'd wait until Louise gets here later. She said she'd show me how to put it on properly." As soon as you say this you realize your mistake, as clearly your mom had several years more practice with makeup that Louise. "She's supposed to tutor me on makeup as one of her responsibilities on the project, otherwise I'd ask you to help."
"That's fine sweetie. I know you've all got your responsibilities, but I know a few tricks that may help, so don't forget to check with your dear old auntie later on!"

You eat your breakfast, and pour yourself some orange juice. The sunshine seems fairly warm, so you're tempted to go out into the yard, but your cell bleeps before you head outside. It's a message from Louise to say she's on her way.
1312111221211111211111.title: Next morning

13121112212111112111111.content:
Louise arrives soon after. Your mom offers her a juice, which she accepts, and you sit for a few minutes in the kitchen. All this time she is looking at you, although you fully appreciate it's not for the reasons you'd normally like a girl to look at you, but she's trying to work out the changes that will be needed to make you look like a Madeleine.

You eventually bite the proverbial bullet and ask if she'd like to accompany you to your bedroom - albeit that is where the boxes had been deposited. Far from her room which had been filled with bottles, brushes, hair clips, bracelets, bangles, yours has a bangle tree, a couple of deodorants, and only one comb.

She looks around, locates one of the cases, and pulls out a carrier bags, which she carefully empties onto your bed. Oh, so that's where everything is. A multitude of eye shadows, lipsticks, foundations and blushers, false eyelashes, hair coloring, brushes, clips, and ties.

"OK Tony, um, sorry, Madeleine," she says, "last time we did this I think I explained the basics. This time we'll need to go into things in a bit more details - although apart from knowing the essentials the best thing will be practice. Your hair may be the only thing you can't do on your own, although with enough practice even that would be possible. One key thing to remember when you're doing your makeup - you'll be building on what you've done previously, so if you've screwed up the foundation, anything on top will look crap."

Louise then takes each item of make-up individually, explains what it is, and applies it to your face. She commences with a foundation cream, which she gently rubs into your face. She explains how to get some color, brushing some blusher onto your cheeks but also telling you of other ways to do it. She adds eye shadow, eyeliner, and mascara. She finishes with lip liner, lipstick and and finally a gloss finish as before. You look at your reflection in your mirror and are surprised that despite Louise doing exactly the same thing some weeks ago, this time you really do look like a girl. You cannot quite work out what is different this time.

"Um, Louise. Last time you did this I looked like a boy wearing makeup. Now I look like a girl. What's different?"

"Ah. Good question. The answer is you. Over the past few weeks you've been using the HRT patches?" You nod in response. "And you've been applying the skin lotion?" You nod again. "So your skin has improved its texture, which allows the makeup to cover more evenly and naturally. You look more like a girl, because your skin is now more like a girl's skin."

Louise then has a go at brushing through your hair, and, as it was a bit unruly to start with, and you haven't had it cut now for several weeks, she manages to maneuver it into two braided pigtails, which you must admit would make you look quite different to before, with your hair pulled well back from your face.

"OK, so you don't have a lot of face hair, but I think you'll need to shave very thoroughly to keep it down. The foundation will only cover so much... Your hair is improving a bit. We may need to add some color to it though - if only to maintain a difference to your own. You'll need to keep the body hair under control now, but otherwise your skin seems to be OK. Your body shape is still not right - obviously..." She smiles at you. "Mind you, I'd say that the HRT patches have certainly done something. It's nothing like an hourglass figure, but there's a definite hint of something, which is good. I think the key thing will be pushing out your breasts."

"Come again?" you respond, fearing that she may be considering something rather more dramatic and possibly irreversible than you'd contemplated.

Noticing your expression, Louise tried to ease your concern. "OK, perhaps I'll rephrase that. We'll need to make your breasts appear larger, more appropriate for a girl. I know that some girls develop later, so it needn't be a major difference, but we do want you to appear obviously female. I think you have filled out a little since we started, but not enough to avoid some padding. The main difficulty will be wearing anything low cut, when your actual cleavage will be visible." She roots around in the bottom of the bag that she'd apparently not fully emptied earlier, and pulls out two pads. "Pop these into your bra for now. We'll work out a better solution later."

You comply, and then smoothing down the tee-shirt. Louise then prompts you to stand and view yourself in the mirror. The change from when you had done this previously is quite amazing. As you had mentioned to Louise earlier, you had then looked like a boy wearing makeup. Now your reflection is very clearly a girl, and whilst you know that it's your reflection, somehow you find it difficult to believe. "Wow."

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/ori...

"OK," Louise says, "that's the easy bit done. Now you need to start acting and behaving like a girl. Let's start with..."
13121112212111112111111.title: Makeup

choices: You meet up with the rest of the project group
131211122121111121111111.content:
"Let's go for a walk," Louise says. She looks at her watch. "The others should have reached the park by now, so we can catch up with them there."

"Um, OK." you reply. "Surely that's not it, though? I thought we'd do a lot more, like, tutoring. I may look like Madeleine now, now I certainly don't feel like her."

"Don't worry, we have a week to work through everything. Besides, I don't want to throw too much at you too quickly - after all you only have a boy's brain capacity, so I don't want to overload you...."

You decide to ignore that particular comment. "Come on, let's go then. Oh, guess I'd better let mom see me first..."

You head back to the kitchen where your mom has her head down sorting out the washing.

"We're going to the park to meet the others." you say. She looks up.

"Oh my. Well, if I ever wondered what it would be like to have a daughter, guess this would be the answer. You look... very passable." She looks at Louise and mouths "very good" at her. "Yes, these next few weeks will certainly be interesting."
There's something about her demeanor that doesn't seem quite right, and you realize that she's dabbing one eye. OMG - she's crying. You suddenly feel very guilty, and uncertain, and confused, and upset for her.

"Off you go," she says, shooing you towards the door. "I'll see you later."

"Yes, but.." you start, but Louise gives you a jab in your back, and pushes you forwards towards the door.

"Not now." she whispers into you ear, and she escorts you out of the kitchen.

Outside you turn to her. "What was that all about? Something has obviously upset Mom, so why did you push me out?"

"OK. So perhaps you're the one who upset her, but not exactly in the way you're thinking. Despite the past few weeks whilst we've been getting everything ready, this is the first time she's actually seen you dressed and made up as a girl, and she's a bit upset that her little boy has gone."

"Yeah, well, I haven't gone anywhere, have I? I'm still here, and when the project's done I'll be back to as I was before."

"Yes, but that's in the future. For today Tony has disappeared, and your Mom is a bit sorry to see him go. Don't worry, she'll be over it by the time you next see her, and from what she said, she thinks you're doing a brilliant job and will be fully supportive of you going forwards."

"Eh. What the hell did she say? I must have missed that."

"Yeah, well. That was a level of female communication that you may never learn."

You decide to give that argument up as a bad job, and accept what Louise has suggested. "OK, let's go and meet the others then."

The walk to the park is less than a mile, but you find that you are continually conscious of yourself, both how you look (and hoping and trusting you don't pass anyone you know just in case they recognize you) and what you're wearing - particularly the skirt, which whilst no shorter than some of your shorts, somehow feels that it's showing more of your thighs than you're used to. You're also conscious of how you're walking, and trying to sway your hips as you walk, as you think Louise is. After a couple of minutes she stops walking, and you similarly stop, rather than carrying on without her.

"What are you doing?" She asks.

"Um, walking?"

"Well, some might call it that. It's more like you're parading in a beauty contest, or trying to attract the focus of any male in the vicinity. Look, stop wiggling your bloody hips. Girls don't walk like that. Take slightly shorter steps. Focus more on where your feet are going and keep your legs closer together. Then, relax. Stop being so conscious of what you're trying to do, just let it happen. It may actually be better to get you into heels soon - that will force you to walk differently - although will probably kill your ankles for a few days."

Bugger! And you thought you were doing OK. You set off again, trying to take on board the latest advice whilst trying not to think about it - yeah, right.
131211122121111121111111.title: a walk in the park

1312111221211111211111112.content:
You reach the entrance to the park, and there are some people walking out, and directly towards you. OK, so you can just keep your head down (metaphorically at least) and try to ignore them. However, you realize that its a couple of boys from your school, and whilst you don't know them well, they are certainly in your circle of acquaintances. Oh bugger. Not what you'd hoped for. Louise has also noticed, and whispers in your ear "Let me do the talking. Just respond nicely if they say anything to you. Remember - you don't know them."

Well, guess this will be a test of the makeup, and whether you actually look like (and walk like) a girl or not.

"Hiya Lou." one of the boys says. You remember his name is Zeb. Ah, yes, and the other is Leo. "Who's you friend?"
"This is Madeleine," Louise replies. "She's just arrived from Canada, and I'm showing her around."
"Hiya Madeleine" Zeb says.
"Hi!" you reply, in what you hope is your best female Canadian accent. You are conscious of both boys eyeing you up and down.
"So, you just visiting, or sticking around for a while?" Zeb asks.
"Um, I'll be staying for a few months..." you respond.
Zeb is clearly keen to ask another question, but Louise cuts in. "She'll be here for the rest of the semester, so you'll have plenty of opportunity to question her more. Give the girl a break - it's her first day here."
"All the more reason to make her feel at home," Zeb responds to Louise, and then turns his face towards you. "Any friend of Lou's is a friend of mine. If you fancy something a bit more exciting than a walk in the park of a Saturday morning, then I'm sure I could oblige. Just let me know."
Whilst you aren't close enough to Zeb socially to know much about his interests or love life, you have a sneaky suspicion what he may be suggesting, so decide that you'd better not get any more involved.
"Um, thanks, I''ll bear that in mind...." you reply.
"No problem Madeleine, nice to meet you. Hope to see more of you soon." You could swear that as he finished speaking he winked at you. Oh shit. That wasn't something that you had contemplated - a boy hitting on you. Stupidly you can feel yourself blushing.

Louise grabs you by your arm, says bye to the boys, and pushes you forwards.

Once out of earshot she says quietly to you "Well, that went OK, didn't it?"
"Apart from nearly getting myself a boyfriend, then yes."
"Yeah, but that proves the point, doesn't it? They didn't have any doubts that you are a girl. And that's your first day out. By the time the holiday is over and we get back to school you should have perfected it!"
"I admire your confidence in me, but I still feel like a fish out of water."
"I think you handled yourself fine."
1312111221211111211111112.title: You meet someone else

choices: You adopt the French plus broken English approach
You stick with your Canadian accent alone
13121112212111112111111121.content:
You see the rest of the girls up ahead, so try to forget your recent encounter. "Hiya Madeleine. Hi Lou." they chorus. You return their welcome and you both sit down on the grass. You remember just in time that you're wearing a skirt, so you don't drop straight down onto you bottom as you would normally, but lower yourself to your knees first, and then drop to one side.

"How's your first day so far?" Amy asks.
Remembering that you will need to remain 'in character' now - especially with Zeb and Leo not that far away, you respond in your Canadian accent. "Well, my mom was in tears when we left home, and I may need to start fighting off potential suitors. That aside, not too bad."
"Yeah, I've been thinking about that last bit. I think your husky Canadian accent is probably going to be more of a hindrance - there's something about it that seems to act like a pheromone, attracting the boys. We may need to consider a different approach."
"Eh, so what do you mean? Drop the Canadian accent? I'd just sound like me then."
"Not necessarily dropping it, no, but I think we need to think about it. There's more to making you appear female than just your looks, but also your mannerisms - and how you sound. So, when you speak normally your voice is at a particular frequency. Generally a girl's voice is at a higher frequency."
"Ok, so a bit higher pitched?"
"Well, yes. About an octave higher. But girls also speak differently, so even if you increase your pitch it would still not make a true female voice."
"OK, so what do I do?" you ask.
"Well, to raise your voice by an octave is normally surgical anyway. To change the way you speak can be done by training."
"I thought there were sprays that would change your voice. Wouldn't that work?"
"Not really. They are primarily to improve the clarity of speech, not to increase the pitch. Anything that says it will increase the pitch is either a short term gimmick or is lying."
"Oh, you mean like breathing in helium?"
"Yes. It works to a degree, but the effects don't last long."
"Could I just say that I would object to any thoughts of surgery on my throat!"
"Yes, I had considered it, but it's obviously a bit complex and costly, and not easily reversible, so perhaps not a route we want to take." You mentally breathe a sign of relief.
"However," Amy continues, "there may be some training options if we can get you to see a speech therapist. Either that, or you give up speaking in English."
"What? You mean only speak in French? Why?"
"Everyone would be too busy trying to translate what you're saying to notice any inconsistencies in your voice."
"Hmm, not too sure about that. My French isn't brilliant."
"Could be an ideal way to improve it then!" Louise says.
"How about speaking in broken English, like French is my primary language, and I'm still learning English. Would that be enough confusion?"
"Um, maybe. Could we worth trying it I suppose." Amy responds."You'd have to keep it up though, no slipping back into 'real' English!"

“Um, no, thanks.“ you reply. You are now feeling quite uncomfortable. Whilst the initial prospect of putting on girls’ clothes seemed something of a turn on, the reality isn’t quite so appealing – especially with a female audience. “I’m really not sure about this at all. There’s no way I’m going to be convincing as a girl. It’s just all too alien to me.”

“Yeah, that’s OK. You can’t expect to feel right at once. Don’t worry about it – it’s something you’ll get used to.” Amy replies, clearly trying to calm your agitation. “Nobody suggested you would find it easy at first. “Can I make a suggestion?” Amy asks. “Now that you’ve completed a kick off sessions with everyone, why don’t you try to focus on your normal school schedule, and let Susan start to monitor what you’re doing and record your natural behavoirs and responses. At the weekend we could then all meet up and try to make you feel a bit more comfortable about your role. If we can get your makeup done, some changes to your hair, and get you dressed up, you might believe in yourself a little more.”
